description: Creamy, dreamy, and packed with cozy flavor—these cookies taste just like your favorite holiday pie with a luscious cheesecake surprise in the center.
ingredients: [{"name": "unsalted butter", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "brown sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "large eggs", "units": null, "amount": 2}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "tsp", "amount": 2}, {"name": "all-purpose flour", "units": "cups", "amount": 2.5}, {"name": "baking soda", "units": "tsp", "amount": 1}, {"name": "cinnamon", "units": "tsp", "amount": 1}, {"name": "nutmeg", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "salt", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "mashed sweet potato", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "brown sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "cinnamon", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "nutmeg", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "cream cheese", "units": "oz", "amount": 8}, {"name": "powdered sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.5}]
instructions: 1. Prep Cheesecake Filling: Mix cream cheese, powdered sugar, and vanilla until smooth. Scoop into 1 tsp-sized balls and freeze for 30 minutes. 2. Make Sweet Potato Mixture: Combine mashed sweet potato with brown sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Set aside. 3. Cookie Dough Time: Cream butter with both sugars until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, whisk dry ingredients. Combine with wet mix. 4. Assemble Cookies: Scoop cookie dough and flatten into a disc. Add a small scoop of sweet potato mixture and a frozen cream cheese ball in the center. Wrap dough around fillings and seal edges. Place on lined baking sheet. 5. Bake: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Bake cookies for 12–14 minutes or until edges are golden. Let cool before serving (the centers will set as they cool).
notes: These cookies are meant to be shared, to be the centerpiece of a conversation, to be the thing everyone remembers about the party.
tags: cookies, dessert, holiday, sweet potato, cheesecake
